TopicTitle: Any Custom Nozzle Size LF/O Engines

Articles.Content:
After seeing Scott Manley's video about KSP not teaching nozzles, I ask if anyone who reads this can make a mod that can make customizable engine nozzles with Atmo or vacuum Styles

When If you can find or make this idea of mod please put it on Spacedock or in the fourms. Thanks!
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
